Leagues

Upcoming and Ongoing Leagues in Oakland County

Oakland University - Katke Cousins

  • (Par 72, 7,450 yards)
  • Listed Top 10 Course in MI by Detroit News
  • Artictecture by Bob Beard
  • Designed by Bill Newcomb

Oakland University - R&S Sharf Golf Course

  • (Par 72, 7,103 yards)
  • Ranked 12th Course in MI by GolfDigest in 2009
  • Artictecture by Warren Henderson
  • Designed by Rick Smith

Pine Trace Golf Club

  • (Par 72, 6,610 yards)
  • 193 Wooded Acres with Pinetree Bordered Fairways
  • Built in 1989
  • Designed by Arthur Hills

Black Heath Golf Club

  • (Par 71, 6,728 yards)
  • Built and Hosted of the US Amateur Sectional Qualifier in 1998
  • Awared 3.5 Stars by Golf Digest
  • Constructed and Designed by Kevin Aldrich

Fieldstone Golf Club

  • (Par 72, 6,386 yards)
  • One of Oakland County's Top Coures with a Variety of Terrains
  • Built in 1998
  • Designed by Arthur Hills
